common_2110_announce_01:
All right! Let’s jump right into the first round,
everyone! Who will the fates pair up today?!
common_2110_friend_01:
You’ve got to be kidding me. Up against my little
Champion buddy right from the first round...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So how about it, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Bet
you’re\r
surprised\r
to\r
see\r
me\r
in\r
this\r
tournament, right?![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_03a:
Heheh... Yeah, that’s right! That dumbfounded
expression is what I wanted to see![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_03b:
Wait, you actually thought I would sign up for
this thing? Boy, I guess you really do get me...\r
No wonder we’re best buds![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_04:
See, when we went down into Area Zero, it really
drove home for me how I need to get stronger.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_05:
So I’ve been off doing some super-special
training with Mabosstiff and my team![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_06:
If we ever end up in trouble again, I want to be
there fighting beside you—on the same level.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_07:
So today I’m here to WIN! Even if it might only
be by a stroke of luck![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_08:
Get a taste of this! Arven’s here with some spicy
new flavor for you![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_announce_04:
And the winner of this first-round battle is...
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
common_2110_mobs_01:
Whoo! All right! That professor’s kid put up a
heck of a fight!
common_2110_mobs_02: What a spicy start! And that’s only the first match!
common_2110_friend_09:
Phew, the strength of a Champion is legit! It hurts
to lose, but I’m proud of you, little buddy![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_10:
Maybe I should think about going around to all
those Gyms myself sometime...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2110_friend_11:
You’d better try just as hard as I would’ve in
round two, for me![VAR 0114(0006)]
